<h3 id="X24440">X(24440)&nbsp;=&nbsp; (A,B,C,X(1); A',B',C',X(1)) COLLINEATION IMAGE OF X(10), WHERE A'B'C' = N-OBVERSE TRIANGLE OF X(1)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a (a b^2 + b^3 + a b c - 2 b^2 c + a c^2 - 2 b c^2 + c^3) : :
